title: Tell the Wolves I'm Home: 5 Minute Digest: A Reader's Companion

The 5 Minute Publication is available FREE for all Prime Members on KU/KOLL and offered at only $2.99 for others.With this digest, you'll • Content for your book club or other group event.• Supplement material to the actual book.• An overview before/after reading the original title.• Interesting facts about the book & author; additional interesting stories. This is NOT a summary of the book.
